Zend_Gdata  
Health  
No 
No 

Description

Concrete class for working with CCR elements.

Methods

__call, __construct, getDOM, transferFromDOM,

__call( string   $name, unknown   $args, ) : array.<DOMElement>

Description

Magic helper that allows drilling down and returning specific elements in the CCR. For example, to retrieve the users medications (/ContinuityOfCareRecord/Body/Medications) from the entry's CCR, call $entry->getCcr()->getMedications(). Similarly, getConditions() would return extract the user's conditions.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$name string | Name of the function to call
$args unknown |

Return value

Type Description
array.<DOMElement> A list of the appropriate CCR data

__construct( DOMElement   $element = null, ) : n/a

Description

Creates a Zend_Gdata_Health_Extension_Ccr entry, representing CCR data

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$element DOMElement | (optional) DOMElement from which this object should be constructed. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.

transferFromDOM( DOMNode   $node, ) : n/a

Description

Transfers each child and attribute into member variables.

This is called when XML is received over the wire and the data model needs to be built to represent this XML.


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$node DOMNode | The DOMNode that represents this object's data

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
